review: First let me say that I am a huge fan of Amazon.  I have experienced lots of great buys and very fair prices, and Customer Service is truly great.  Basically, I do all my shopping with Amazon.  However, I have to be honest and admit Amazon has missed with this product.  It really doesn't work - at least not  well enough.  My experience was that it could not hold a Wi-Fi signal for very long.  One might make the argument that my modem is too far from the TV, etc..  But that argument doesn't hold up because - before and after the Stick - an inexpensive Sony smart blue-ray player has functioned just fine for the same TV in the same place.  Now I must admit that Amazon sent an email suggesting a number of research steps I might go through regarding my Wi-Fi connection so they could better solve the issue.  But the instructions were much too complicated for my interests.  Why would I want to do all that when I can simply use another device?  Let me also note that I use the regular Fire TV box for my primary TV and it works great.  However, that doesn't really mean anything regarding Wi-Fi because I use an Ethernet connection with that device - so I don't know..
